Heading: Publisher to retailers
Note: Publisher as supplier to retail trade outlets

Heading: Sales agent
Note: DEPRECATED – use <MarketRepresentation> (ONIX 2.1) or <MarketPublishingDetail> (ONIX 3.0) to specify a sales agent

Heading: Publisher’s distributor to retailers
Note: In a specified supply territory. Use only where exclusive/non-exclusive status is not known. Prefer 02 or 03 as appropriate, where possible

Heading: POD supplier
Note: Where a POD product is supplied to retailers and/or consumers direct from a POD source

Heading: Publisher to end-customers
Note: Publisher as supplier direct to consumers and/or institutional customers

Heading: Exclusive distributor to end-customers
Note: Intermediary as exclusive distributor direct to consumers and/or institutional customers

Heading: Non-exclusive distributor to end-customers
Note: Intermediary as non-exclusive distributor direct to consumers and/or institutional customers

Heading: Distributor to end-customers
Note: Use only where exclusive/non-exclusive status is not known. Prefer 10 or 11 as appropriate, where possible

Heading: Exclusive distributor to retailers and end-customers
Note: Intermediary as exclusive distributor to retailers and direct to consumers and/or institutional customers. For use in ONIX 3.0 only

Heading: Non-exclusive distributor to retailers and end-customers
Note: Intermediary as non-exclusive distributor to retailers and direct to consumers and/or institutional customers. For use in ONIX 3.0 only

Heading: Distributor to retailers and end-customers
Note: Use only where exclusive/non-exclusive status is not known. Prefer codes 13 or 14 as appropriate whenever possible. For use in ONIX 3.0 only
